subject: Careers and Professions
Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ closer may be on the brink of surpassing Trevor Hoffman’s career total of 601 saves, but his quest has attracted far less attention than did Derek Jeter’s pursuit of 3,000 hits.
snippet: The Yankees’ closer may be on the brink of surpassing Trevor Hoffman’s career total of 601 saves, but his quest has attracted far less attention than did Derek Jeter’s pursuit of 3,000 hits.
